auth-login-link-failure.ADDITIONAL_INFO: Maybe this link isn't valid anymore? Note that login links can only be used once, after that they expire for security reasons. New links also replace old ones - make sure this is the most recent link!

auth-my-account-integration-confirm.NOSCRIPT_MESSAGE: Please enable JavaScript to setup the integration.
auth-my-account-integration-confirm.UPLOAD_DESCRIPTION: If desired, we can automatically upload your comments from your <%= integrationName %> installation during the sync. Otherwise, uncheck the box below and you can perform it yourself later.
auth-my-account-integration-confirm.CHECKBOX_UPLOAD_COMMENTS_HELP: You can upload your comments later from the plugin admin page.
auth-my-account-integration-confirm.CHECKBOX_SYNC_DATABASE: Automatically keep my <%= integrationName %> database in sync.
auth-my-account-integration-confirm.CHECKBOX_SYNC_DATABASE_HELP: This keeps your <%= integrationName %> database up to date. Useful if any plugins require the latest comments in your database. Commonly disabled with very high volume sites, where keeping <%= integrationName %> up to date creates undesirable load.

auth-my-account-integration-setup.UPDATE_INFO: This page will update as the integration progresses.
auth-my-account-integration-setup.SYNC_INFO: After this is done we'll keep your comments in sync with your site so if you ever deactivate FastComments you won't lose any data.
auth-my-account-integration-setup.LOGS_INFO: These logs will be kept for two years.

auth-my-account-integration-setup-failur.ERROR_DESCRIPTION: It looks like the integration you are using gave you an invalid URL. Please contact support.

auth-my-account-integration-token-failed.PAGE_SUBHEADING: We never heard from your integration!
auth-my-account-integration-token-failed.ERROR_MESSAGE: We never heard from the FastComments plugin for this integration token.
auth-my-account-integration-token-failed.INSTRUCTION_1: Ensure the previous window or tab, with the plugin's admin page, is kept open. This window contains a script which starts the integration.
auth-my-account-integration-token-failed.INSTRUCTION_2: Ensure you don't have firewall rules blocking outbound requests from your site to fastcomments.com

calculator-v2.HERO_DESCRIPTION: Fill out the form below to get an estimate. The estimate will reload as each value changes. Inputs are saved so you can return later!
calculator-v2.LABEL_MONTHLY_TRAFFIC: Expected Monthly Traffic to Comment Widget
calculator-v2.LABEL_DOMAINS_HELP: Include development sites other than localhost.
calculator-v2.LABEL_ADMINISTRATORS_HELP: Some example use cases for admins are managing billing, account data, and developer access.
calculator-v2.LABEL_DEBRANDING_HELP: On some plans we show our logo at the bottom of the comment widget. Not all plans support de-branding.
calculator-v2.LABEL_MANAGED_TENANTS_HELP: For example, if you want to manage other accounts under your account, or if you want to have a separate sub-account for each site/ environment. We call these tenants.
calculator-v2.LABEL_SSO_USERS_HELP: SSO, aka Single-Sign-On, is for easy authentication for your users. If you don't know what this is, enter 0.
calculator-v2.LABEL_API_CREDITS_HELP: For most cases, 1 Credit = 1 API Call. If you don't plan on using our API this doesn't apply to you.
calculator-v2.CARD_DESCRIPTION_FLEX: Only pay for what you use.

company.HERO_DESCRIPTION: Fast, reliable software that puts your community first.
company.IMAGE_CAPTION: 20 years ago when companies had offices.
company.PARAGRAPH_1: Headquartered in California, USA, FastComments is committed on providing high quality, performant, privacy focused discussion software.
company.PARAGRAPH_2: All software is written in the US. We are a small family-run company.
company.PARAGRAPH_3: Reliable and fast software takes a lot of love to create. We hope you see that in FastComments.
company.PARAGRAPH_4: We are committed to making our on-boarding process as seamless as possible. When you sign up for FastComments, your account is assigned to a developer and most communication will go through them. Don't be afraid to ask technical questions or help with customizations.
company.PARAGRAPH_5: If you have any questions at all, or have an RFP, feel free to reach out to us.
company.HQ_LOCATION: Folsom and San Jose, CA, United States of America

competitors.NOSCRIPT_MESSAGE: Please enable JavaScript to view the comments powered by Disqus.

contact-us.HERO_DESCRIPTION: Get in touch with the FastComments team
contact-us.SALES_MEETING_TEXT: Use Calendly in the bottom right to setup a call.
contact-us.EMAIL_SUPPORT_TEXT: You can reach us via email at [click to show support email].
contact-us.EMAIL_HIDDEN_REASON: The email his hidden to help prevent automated scraping of our contact information.
contact-us.EMAIL_SALES_TEXT: You can reach us via email at [click to show sales email].
contact-us.PHONE_TEXT: You can reach us via phone at [click to show phone].
contact-us.PHONE_HIDDEN_REASON: The phone his hidden to help prevent automated scraping of our contact information.
contact-us.PHONE_AVAILABILITY: We are generally available 9-5 Mon-Fri PST.
contact-us.HEADING_ALTERNATIVE_CONTACT: An Alternative, Reliable Way to Contact Us
contact-us.ALTERNATIVE_CONTACT_TEXT_1: Another way to reach out to us is via the Help Request page.
contact-us.ALTERNATIVE_CONTACT_TEXT_2: We have a 24 hour SLA for answering requests via this mechanism.
contact-us.ALTERNATIVE_CONTACT_TEXT_3: This page requires that you have an account.
contact-us.ALTERNATIVE_CONTACT_TEXT_4: If you want to do business with us, then use this page to create your account.
contact-us.ALTERNATIVE_CONTACT_TEXT_5: If you're a commenter or already have an account - go here. If you don't have an account, this page will create one for you.

cookie-auth-window.THIRD_PARTY_COOKIES_TIP: Tip! Try enabling third-party cookies if you want to disable this window.
cookie-auth-window.WINDOW_CLOSE_MESSAGE: This window will close in a second.
cookie-auth-window.NOSCRIPT_ERROR: Error! JavaScript is required for this functionality to work. Please close this window, enable JavaScript, and try again.
cookie-auth-window.LOGIN_FAILED_ALERT: Failed to login. Please try again later. If this repeats please reach out to support.

create-conversation.HERO_DESCRIPTION: Conversation links can be embedded in other applications that support oEmbed or embed.ly. Create one here.
create-conversation.INTRO_TEXT: Enter a name for your conversation, or page, below, and we'll provide you with a URL that you can use to embed FastComments in other applications.
create-conversation.ERROR_NOT_LOGGED_IN: You must be logged in to create an embedded conversation link.
create-conversation.ERROR_NOT_TENANT: You must be logged in as your tenant to create an embedded conversation link.
create-conversation.ERROR_LOGGED_IN_AS_COMMENTER: You are currently logged in as a commenter.
create-conversation.FAQ_WHAT_CAN_DO: What can I do with this?
create-conversation.FAQ_WHAT_CAN_DO_ANSWER: This allows you to take our live, customizable commenting widget and embed it in other applications like Notion or Google Sites. Learn more about this here.
create-conversation.FAQ_HOW_MANY: How many conversations can I create?
create-conversation.FAQ_HOW_MANY_ANSWER: Currently, accounts are limited to two million conversations, however this can be increased upon request.
create-conversation.FAQ_NEED_FOR_WEBSITE: Do I need to do this to add FastComments to a website or custom application?
create-conversation.FAQ_NEED_FOR_WEBSITE_ANSWER: No! This is only for integrating into products that support embed.ly. If you want to add FastComments to WordPress, or a custom site, you don't have to create conversations manually. See our installation docs.
create-conversation.FAQ_BELONG_TO_ACCOUNT: Do embed links belong to my account?
create-conversation.FAQ_BELONG_TO_ACCOUNT_ANSWER: Yes, embed links are tied to your tenant.
create-conversation.FAQ_IS_PRIVATE_ANSWER: In order to function, the links used to create embedded conversations have to be publicly available. However, the URL contains a uniquely generated ID to make it difficult to guess.
create-conversation.FAQ_NEED_OEMBED: Do I have to use this with an application that supports oEmbed?
create-conversation.FAQ_NEED_OEMBED_ANSWER: Not necessarily! You can use this to create a link to simply chat with, and send it to a group.

create-conversation-failure.HERO_DESCRIPTION: We couldn't create your conversation. <%= errorMessage ? errorMessage : 'This was an internal error. Please report this to your customer service representative.' %>
create-conversation-failure.BUTTON_TRY_AGAIN: Try to create a new conversation.

create-conversation-success.HERO_DESCRIPTION: You can now use this URL to embed this FastComments conversation in any application that supports embed.ly.
create-conversation-success.COPY_INSTRUCTIONS: Copy this URL and paste it into an application that supports embed.ly, like Notion. Learn more here.
create-conversation-success.CONVERSATION_DESCRIPTION: Here is the comment widget for your conversation, which you may embed with the above link. Adding comments here will cause them to also appear when the comment widget is embedded.
