demo.HERO_DESCRIPTION: FastComments is packed with features, but don't let that fool you. With every release we've kept the our commenting product free of bloat. Try out the live demo below.
demo.DEMO_SELECTOR_SUBTITLE: FastComments supports many different use cases. Try one below!
demo.OUR_CUSTOMERS_SUBTEXT: No Credit Card Required For Initial Sign up & Installation

error.HERO_DESCRIPTION: You've stumbled on our error page. Don't worry, we were also notified and will investigate this. If this persists please file a support ticket.

global-distribution.META_DESCRIPTION: FastComments delivers your comments and media from the edge with our own global CDN and DNS infrastructure for maximum privacy and performance.
global-distribution.HERO_DESCRIPTION: Your comments and media delivered from the edge, powered by our own CDN and DNS infrastructure. No third-party tracking, maximum performance, complete privacy.
global-distribution.GLOBAL_NETWORK_SUBTITLE: FastComments operates its own global infrastructure with edge locations worldwide, ensuring your comments and media are delivered with lightning speed and complete privacy.
global-distribution.BENEFIT_PRIVACY_TEXT: We host our own CDN and DNS infrastructure. No third-party tracking, no data sharing with external CDN providers. Your users' privacy is protected.
global-distribution.BENEFIT_PERFORMANCE_TEXT: Comments and media served from the nearest edge location to your users. Faster loading times mean better user experience and engagement.
global-distribution.BENEFIT_RELIABILITY_TEXT: Multiple failover systems and redundant infrastructure ensure your comments are always available, no matter what.
global-distribution.BENEFIT_SECURITY_TEXT: On-disk encryption, DDoS protection, and security monitoring across all edge locations protect your community.
global-distribution.TECH_SELF_HOSTED_CDN_DESC: Complete control over content delivery. No third-party CDN providers means no external tracking or data sharing.
global-distribution.TECH_GLOBAL_DNS_DESC: Our own DNS infrastructure with global routing ensures fast resolution times worldwide.
global-distribution.TECH_EDGE_COMPUTING_DESC: Comments are processed and cached at the edge, reducing server round trips and improving response times.
global-distribution.TECH_SMART_CACHING_DESC: Intelligent caching strategies optimize performance while ensuring real-time comment updates and live conversations.
global-distribution.TECH_AUTO_FAILOVER_DESC: Multi-layer redundancy with automatic failover systems ensure continuous availability even during outages.
global-distribution.TECH_MONITORING_DESC: 24/7 monitoring of all edge locations with automated alerts and proactive issue resolution.
global-distribution.CTA_SUBTITLE: Join thousands of websites already benefiting from our global infrastructure.

homepage-email-opt-out.HERO_DESCRIPTION: You've successfully opted out of notifications for continuing the signup process. No hard feelings.
homepage-email-opt-out.CLOSE_WINDOW_MESSAGE: You may now close this window.

index.PAGE_TITLE: FastComments - Live Commenting For Any Website or Application
index.HERO_DESCRIPTION: Pick a commenting system that will delight your users and developers. We'll provide the features you care about without spying on you.
index.SNIPPET_HEADING: Get Commenting Code For Your Site
index.SECTION_KEY_FEATURES_SUBTITLE: Discover the standout features that make our product unique: unparalleled performance, user-friendly design, robust security, and seamless integration tailored to your needs.
index.FEATURE_LIVE_CONVERSATIONS_DESC: Your community chats in real time on your website or application.
index.FEATURE_SCALABLE_DESC: Millions of pages or thousands of comments per page? It won't slow us down.
index.FEATURE_SSO_WEBHOOKS_DESC: Your community chats in real time on your website or application.
index.FEATURE_EFFICIENT_MODERATION_DESC: Moderate Quickly with Bulk Actions and Moderation Groups. Invite your moderators and get them to work.
index.FEATURE_MIGRATE_IN_MINUTES_DESC: Automated Migration from WordPress, Disqus, Commento, Muut Comments, IntenseDeba te, JustComments
index.FEATURE_FIGHT_SPAM_DESC: Get protected by a classifier that is continuously trained. Automatically remove unverified comments.
index.FEATURE_NOTIFICATIONS_DESC: Get fine grained, high level, scheduled, or immediate notifications.
index.FEATURE_CODE_MARKDOWN_DESC: Automatically detect, color, and format pasted code snippets.
index.FEATURE_ADAPTIVE_DESC: Adapts to your site - whether it has a light or a dark theme.
index.FEATURE_LOCALIZED_DESC: The client-side widgets and emails are fully localized in 14+ languages using browser locale detection.
index.FEATURE_CUSTOM_EMAIL_TEMPLATES_DESC: Emails sent to users can be customized and styled.
index.FEATURE_GO_INCOGNITO_DESC: Allow anonymous commenting, where an email is not required to comment.
index.FEATURE_INCREASE_ENGAGEMENT_DESC: FastComments decreases the time to comment, either with SSO integration or by providing a low-friction way to sign up.
index.FEATURE_MENTIONS_DESC: Tag users with our easy to use @mentions and they'll get notified right away.
index.FEATURE_HASHTAGS_DESC: Autocompleted hashtags, with the ability to pre-seed hashtags that point to external content.
index.FEATURE_GIFS_DESC: GIF picker with anonymized integrations with major providers.
index.FEATURE_SUBSCRIPTIONS_DESC: Your users stay up to date about new activity via subscriptions.
index.FEATURE_AWARDS_BADGES_DESC: Craft custom badges and reward your community.
index.FEATURE_USER_PROFILES_DESC: User Profiles complete with activity feeds and guestbook.
index.FEATURE_DIRECT_MESSAGING_DESC: Realtime messaging between users of your community.
index.FEATURE_RATINGS_REACTIONS_SURVEYS_DESC: Collect and report on reviews, reacts, and surveys.
index.FEATURE_ACCESS_CONTROL_DESC: Group users and limit access to comments.
index.FEATURE_NOTIFICATIONS_ALT_DESC: We help your community keep in touch with each other via reply, thread, and reaction notifications.
index.FEATURE_ANALYTICS_DESC: Built in analytics tools to monitor your site's traffic and activity at no extra cost.
index.FEATURE_FULL_TEXT_SEARCH_DESC: Moderators can search for comments by their text, or add search to any comment widget directly.
index.EXCELLENCE_BATTLE_TESTED_DESC: <%- Number(usageStats.pageLoadCount).toLocaleString() %> page loads in the last year.
index.SCALE_DETAILED_AUDITING_DESC: Fine-grained filterable audit log with API access.
index.SCALE_USER_MANAGEMENT_DESC: Manage users with fine-grained control over permissions.
index.SCALE_GDPR_COMPLIANCE_DESC: FastComments is GDPR compliant. See our Privacy Policy for how we manage user data.
index.SCALE_DEVELOPMENT_SUPPORT_DESC: You won't be left in the dark with direct development, integration, and setup support.

login-failure.HERO_DESCRIPTION: For some reason you couldn't be logged in. Please try again later.
login-failure.LINK_VALIDITY_MESSAGE: Maybe this link isn't valid anymore? Note that login links can only be used once, after that they expire for security reasons. New links also replace old ones - make sure this is the most recent link!

login-forgot-username.HERO_DESCRIPTION: No worries, it happens to the best of us!
login-forgot-username.EMAIL_HELP_TEXT: We'll send you your username via email. For security reasons we can't tell you whether your email is correct.
login-forgot-username.CAPTCHA_HELP: Helps determine you're not a bot.
login-forgot-username.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: If you have an account at that email, you should receive an email with your username shortly.
login-forgot-username.SUCCESS_CHECK_SPAM: Remember to check your spam folder.
login-forgot-username.SUCCESS_CLOSE_WINDOW: You may now close this window.

login-request-failure.HERO_DESCRIPTION: <%= (typeof message !== 'undefined' && message) ? message : 'Something went wrong with your login request.' %>
login-request-failure.ERROR_MESSAGE: Something went wrong with your login request.

login-request-region-confirm.HERO_DESCRIPTION: You have an account on <%= otherRegionDomain %> - do you want to log in there instead?
login-request-region-confirm.INFO_MESSAGE_BOLD: You have an account in our other datacenter.
login-request-region-confirm.INFO_MESSAGE_WARNING: If you don't redirect, we will create an account here for you if it doesn't exist, and then you will have two accounts.

login-request-success.HERO_DESCRIPTION_DEFAULT: Check your inbox. We sent a link for you to complete the login process.
login-request-success.HERO_DESCRIPTION_MODERATOR: Your invite has been processed successfully. Thanks for joining FastComments as a moderator.
login-request-success.MODERATOR_INFO: One thing you will notice is that FastComments doesn't use passwords by default. We use emails to authenticate you. You can set a password later.
login-request-success.THANK_YOU_MESSAGE: Thanks for using FastComments password-less login! You may now close this window.

login-success.HEADING: You're now logged in
login-success.COMMENTER_MESSAGE: You can now comment on any site using FastComments without reentering your name or email.
login-success.FIRST_TIME_MESSAGE: If you need to login again get a new login URL at <%= FC_DOMAIN %>.
login-success.WINDOW_CLOSE_MESSAGE: This window will close in a moment.

login-two-factor.HERO_DESCRIPTION: Please enter your verification code to complete sign in
login-two-factor.AUTHENTICATOR_INSTRUCTION: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
login-two-factor.SMS_INSTRUCTION: We've sent a code to <%= selectedConfig.phoneNumber ? selectedConfig.phoneNumber.replace(/(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{4})/, '(***) ***-$3') : 'your phone' %>

maintenance-page.HERO_DESCRIPTION: This functionality is not available while we are undergoing maintenance.

marketing_common.USAGE_STATS_TITLE: These counts update every five minutes.
marketing_common.FAQ_V2_SUBTITLE: We've compiled answers to some of the most common questions to help you get started.!
marketing_common.OUR_CUSTOMERS_SUBTITLE: Thousands of satisfied customers trust us for our exceptional service, reliability, and innovative solutions. Join our growing community and experience the difference today!
marketing_common.PUBLIC_HEADER_MAINTENANCE: We are currently undergoing maintenance. Authentication, account creation, and many features are disabled.
marketing_common.PUBLIC_FOOTER_V2_FASTCOMMENTS_DESCRIPTIO: FastComments is a fast, live, embedded discussion platform.
marketing_common.PUBLIC_FOOTER_V2_COPYRIGHT: © <%- new Date().getFullYear() %> FastComments. All rights reserved.
marketing_common.PUBLIC_FOOTER_DARK_MODE_NOTE: Dark mode active based on your device's preferences.
marketing_common.FAQ_CAN_MIGRATE: Can I migrate my data from my existing solution?
marketing_common.FAQ_CAN_MIGRATE_ANSWER: All plans support automated self-service migration from a selection of major providers. We perform custom migrations.
marketing_common.FAQ_CUSTOMIZE_UI: Can we customize the UI of the comment widget?
marketing_common.FAQ_CUSTOMIZE_UI_ANSWER: Yes, the comment widget is designed to be customized.
marketing_common.FAQ_EXISTING_ACCOUNTS: What if my users already have accounts? They have to have an account to comment now too?
marketing_common.FAQ_EXISTING_ACCOUNTS_ANSWER: FastComments supports SSO, which means that your users can have one login for your site/application, and commenting.
marketing_common.FAQ_REQUIREMENTS: Does FastComments require anything special on my site to run?
marketing_common.FAQ_REQUIREMENTS_ANSWER: No, our commenting widget has no dependencies.
marketing_common.FAQ_CUSTOMER_SERVICE_SLAS: What are your customer service SLAs?
marketing_common.FAQ_CUSTOMER_SERVICE_SLAS_ANSWER: We generally respond within an hour during business hours, and 24 hours at most. There is a ticketing system within the admin area.
marketing_common.FAQ_CANCEL_MYSELF_ANSWER: You can cancel without any intervention from customer support, although we'll reach out to hear what we could have done better!
marketing_common.FAQ_TRIAL_ENDS: What happens when the trial ends?
marketing_common.FAQ_TRIAL_ENDS_ANSWER: The comment widget will still function for a short time, and then hide itself. You and your users will still have full access to the admin area. You will receive reminders, which you can easily opt out of, when the trial ends.
marketing_common.FAQ_EXCEED_LIMITS: What if I exceed the limits of my account?
marketing_common.FAQ_EXCEED_LIMITS_ANSWER: All package details, except for number of comments per month, are hard limits. If you exceed the number of comments per month, we'll reach out to you to negotiate your package.
marketing_common.FAQ_FREE_TIER: I run an open source project with low traffic, is there a free tier?
marketing_common.FAQ_FREE_TIER_ANSWER: There is currently no official free tier, however for example adding comments to OSS documentation pages we make exceptions. Simply create a support ticket after signing up.
marketing_common.FAQ_ADD_USERS: Can I add my developers, moderators, and other admins?
marketing_common.FAQ_ADD_USERS_ANSWER: Yes, FastComments supports adding other users to your account and controlling their permissions.
marketing_common.FAQ_COOKIE_BANNER: Do I need to add a cookie banner to my site?
marketing_common.FAQ_COOKIE_BANNER_ANSWER: You are not required to add a cookie banner on your site if you use FastComments. We only add functional cookies for logging in, and do not add any tracking cookies or cookies that would personally identify your user, to your site.
marketing_common.FAQ_COMMENT_BOX_LIMIT: Is there a limit on the number of comment boxes I can have?
marketing_common.FAQ_COMMENT_BOX_LIMIT_ANSWER: FastComments does not bill on the number of comment boxes, or threads, that you may have. There is no limit today, either. We instead bill on traffic and comment volume.
marketing_common.FAQ_SEO_INDEXABLE: Are comments indexable via search engines?
marketing_common.FAQ_SEO_INDEXABLE_ANSWER: Yes, we ensure that comment threads can be indexed by search engines. Learn more

moderator-join-failure.HERO_DESCRIPTION: <%= typeof errorMessage !== 'undefined' && errorMessage ? errorMessage : 'Something went terribly wrong. We\'re not sure what happened, but we\'ll take a look.' %>

moderator-join-success.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your invite has been processed successfully. Thanks for joining FastComments as a moderator.
moderator-join-success.PASSWORD_INFO: One thing you will notice is that FastComments doesn't use passwords by default. We use emails to authenticate you. You can set a password later.

my-account.TITLE: My Account - FastComments
my-account.SNAPSHOT_MESSAGE: Here is a quick snapshot of your account.
my-account.JAVASCRIPT_REQUIRED: FastComments requires JavaScript to function properly.
my-account.JAVASCRIPT_NOTE: Note! We use very minimal JS - no heavy frameworks - to limit memory usage. We hope you enjoy our product.

my-account-analytics.TEXT_USERS_ONLINE_NOTE: This only includes users that have scrolled down to the comment area.
my-account-analytics.TEXT_NO_PAGE_LIKES: Nothing to see here. Maybe you want to setup the Page Reacts widget?
my-account-analytics.TEXT_NO_USERS_ONLINE: No users currently online, or no comments collected for pages where users are online.
my-account-analytics.HEADING_METRICS_BY_MONTH: Metrics By <%= timePeriod === '12months' ? 'Month - Last 12 Months' : 'Day - Last 30 Days' %>

my-account-api.TILE_SAML_CONFIG_DISABLED_MESSAGE: Current package does not include SAML.
my-account-api.TEXT_CUSTOM_SSO_HELP: Developing a custom SSO solution? Feel free to contact support to start the discussion of how to do your integration. We can work closely with you as needed.
my-account-api.TEXT_WORDPRESS_INFO: If you're on WordPress there's no code to write! Our plugin handles single-sign-on seamlessly. Vew the documentation for WordPress here.

my-account-api-secret.TEXT_NO_API_KEYS: Nothing to see here! Add an API key to get started with the API or Webhooks.
my-account-api-secret.TEXT_SECURITY_WARNING: Don't share your secret keys, and don't do encryption in the browser! See our backend code examples for how to do encryption while keeping your key secure.

my-account-api-secret-delete.QUESTION_CONFIRM_DELETE: Are you sure you want to remove <%= apiSecret.name ? 'the api key "' + apiSecret.name + '"' : 'this api key' %>?
my-account-api-secret-delete.WARNING_USED_BY_WEBHOOKS: This API key is currently used by a webhook. Deleting the API key before updating the webhook will break the integration.

my-account-api-secret-domain.TEXT_DOMAIN_INFO: For configuration like Webhooks, we will determine which API key to use based on this configuration.
my-account-api-secret-domain.LABEL_ASSOCIATE_SECRET_WITH_DOMAIN: Associate the api secret "<%= apiSecret.name %>" with domain:

my-account-badge-users.TEXT_NO_USERS_WITH_BADGE: No users have this badge! Most badges are awarded automatically. If it's a manual badge, you'll have to award it manually.

my-account-billing-analytics.TEXT_TRIAL_PERIOD_NOTE: You are currently in a trial period. The above amount is not due this billing cycle.
my-account-billing-analytics.TEXT_INVOICE_SEND_DATE: Invoice to be sent on <%= invoiceSendDate %>.
my-account-billing-analytics.TEXT_TRIAL_LIMITS_NOTE: Note! Since you are in a trial, you have lower limits applied to your account. Upgrade to a paid account or reach out to support to raise these limits.

my-account-billing-history.TEXT_NO_INVOICES: You don't have any invoices on your account.
my-account-billing-history.TEXT_BILLING_EXTERNALLY_MANAGED: Your billing information is set to Externally Managed. Invoices may not show here.
my-account-billing-history.TEXT_SHOWING_PAGE: Showing page <%= currentPage %> of invoices. <%= invoices.length %> invoices per page.

my-account-billing-info.TEXT_LIFETIME_PLAN: You're currently on a lifetime FastComments plan due to the coupon code you used. If you'd like to switch to a monthly plan with more traffic contact support.
my-account-billing-info.TEXT_BILLING_HANDLED_EXTERNALLY: Billing information for this tenant is handled externally. If you wish to make changes to your plan or make a payment, reach out to support.
my-account-billing-info.TEXT_BILLING_UP_TO_DATE: Looks like your billing info is currently up to date.
my-account-billing-info.TEXT_BILLING_ISSUE: Looks like there is an issue with your current billing info.
my-account-billing-info.TEXT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Thanks for using FastComments. Your information is now secured and subscription has been updated.
my-account-billing-info.TEXT_CARD_NOT_CHARGED_NOW: Your card won't be charged now unless you change plans.
my-account-billing-info.TEXT_CARD_CHARGED_NOW: Your card will be charged now. If you've picked Flex, it will be charged at the end of the billing cycle depending on your usage.
my-account-billing-info.TEXT_PAYMENT_INFO_NOTE: This information will be used for scheduled billing. Payment information is handed off to Stripe - we do not store it.

my-account-cancel.TEXT_ACCOUNT_OWNER_WARNING: You are an account owner. This will cancel the subscription for the account.
my-account-cancel.LABEL_CONFIRM_CHECKBOX: Check this box to confirm your subscription cancellation. You may reactivate your account at any time.

my-account-cancel-failure.TEXT_ERROR_UNKNOWN: We're not sure what happened, but we've been notified to take a look. Your subscription may or may not have been cancelled.

my-account-cancel-success.TEXT_SUBSCRIPTION_CANCELLED: Your subscription was cancelled, but your account remains open if you intend to reactivate it.

my-account-configure-badges.TEXT_NO_BADGES: You don't have any badges! Start rewarding your community today and add some badges.

my-account-configure-badges-badge.TEXT_EDIT_WARNING: Note! Editing badges will change badges already assigned to users. Use with caution to prevent upsetting your community.
my-account-configure-badges-badge.TEXT_CREATE_BADGE_INTRO: To create a badge, first we have to pick the badge type, and how it will look. Badges can either display as styled text or a custom image.
my-account-configure-badges-badge.TEXT_JAVASCRIPT_REQUIRED: This page requires JavaScript to work properly.
my-account-configure-badges-badge.TEXT_MANUAL_BADGE_NOTE: This badge can only be awarded manually by administrators or moderators.
my-account-configure-badges-badge.TEXT_THRESHOLD_NOTE: This will be used to determine if the user gets the badge.
my-account-configure-badges-badge.TEXT_URL_ID_NOTE: The URL, or page id, the user has to comment on to earn the badge.
my-account-configure-badges-badge.TEXT_DISPLAY_LABEL_NOTE: The name commenters will see associated with the badge.
my-account-configure-badges-badge.TEXT_DESCRIPTION_NOTE: An optional description to describe the badge. Shown when mousing over a badge.
my-account-configure-badges-badge.TEXT_ENABLED_NOTE: If a badge is disabled it will no longer be awarded to new users. If it's a manual badge, it won't be available for moderators to award.
my-account-configure-badges-badge.BUTTON_CLICK_TO_SET_IMAGE: Click to set a badge image
my-account-configure-badges-badge.TEXT_BACKGROUND_COLOR_NOTE: The color that displays behind the badge text.
my-account-configure-badges-badge.TEXT_BORDER_COLOR_NOTE: The border color of the badge.
my-account-configure-badges-badge.TEXT_TEXT_COLOR_NOTE: The color of the text in the badge.
my-account-configure-badges-badge.TEXT_CSS_CLASS_NOTE: An optional css class that can be used to further style the badge using Custom CSS.
my-account-configure-badges-badge.TEXT_REPLACES_BADGE_NOTE: For example, you could have a "Top Commenter" badge that replaces a "New Commenter" badge automatically. The user will still have both badges, but the new one will be displayed instead.

my-account-configure-badges-delete.TEXT_CONFIRM_REMOVAL: Please confirm the removal of the badge "<%= badge.displayLabel %>".
my-account-configure-badges-delete.TEXT_REMOVAL_WARNING: This will remove badges from users that have it, which may disrupt your community. Use with caution.

my-account-configure-domains.TEXT_EMAIL_CONFIG_INFO: The following is configuration for how emails should look when FastComments sends emails to your commenters. You don't have to enter anything if you don't want to customize this.
my-account-configure-domains.TEXT_FROM_NAME_EMAIL_NOTE: Note: From-Name and Email settings do not affect emails sent to administrators.
my-account-configure-domains.TITLE_AUTO_ADDED: Automatically added during trial period based on traffic to your account. This is done to ease setup, and only happens during the trial period.
my-account-configure-domains.TEXT_EMAIL_ERROR: Something looks wrong with this email. We've saved any other changes.
my-account-configure-domains.BUTTON_CLICK_TO_UPDATE_LOGO: Click to Update Logo for <%= domain.domain %>
my-account-configure-domains.BUTTON_CLICK_TO_SET_LOGO: Click to Set Logo for <%= domain.domain %>
my-account-configure-domains.TEXT_NO_DOMAINS_WARNING: Whoa! You have no domains. Your widgets will not be able to load until you associate one or more domains with your account.

my-account-configure-domains-disable-aut.TEXT_RE_ENABLE_CONFIRM: You're about to re-enable automatic adding of domains to your account. Continue?
my-account-configure-domains-disable-aut.TEXT_DISABLE_CONFIRM: You're about to disable automatic adding of domains to your account. Continue?
my-account-configure-domains-disable-aut.TEXT_WHITELIST_NOTE: Note that many sites, platforms, and bots are whitelisted so they will not be added to your account. If you think a very common site or platform was added to your account and it should be white listed, let us know so we can improve FastComments.

my-account-configure-domains-failure.TEXT_UPDATE_FAILURE_MESSAGE: We couldn't process your request, your domains were not updated. We're looking into it.

my-account-configure-domains-new.TEXT_ADD_DOMAIN_INFO: Adding a domain lets you customize your widgets and user interactions per-site. It also allows us to validate the requests and tie them to your account
my-account-configure-domains-new.PLACEHOLDER_DOMAIN_NAME: Enter a top-level domain, like fastcomments.com. Use a subdomain to further restrict access if desired.
my-account-configure-domains-new.TEXT_COMMA_SEPARATED_NOTE: You can enter domains in comma-separated format.

my-account-configure-domains-remove-conf.TEXT_REMOVE_CONFIRM: You're about to remove <%= domainName %>. While this won't remove any data and is recoverable any existing widgets on this domain will no longer load. Continue?

my-account-configure-domains-success.TEXT_DOMAINS_UPDATED_MESSAGE: Any further emails sent from us will use the new configuration.

my-account-customize-email-template.TEXT_JAVASCRIPT_REQUIRED: JavaScript is required to use this feature.
my-account-customize-email-template.TEXT_DOCUMENTATION_LINK: Documentation for email templates can be found here.
my-account-customize-email-template.TEXT_RENDER_ERROR_MESSAGE: This template has a recent error, and failed to send.
my-account-customize-email-template.PLACEHOLDER_DISPLAY_NAME: Enter a custom name used to identify this template.
my-account-customize-email-template.TEXT_DISPLAY_NAME_NOTE: The name administrators can refer to this template by.
my-account-customize-email-template.TEXT_DOMAIN_NOTE_CAN_BE_SPECIFIC: The template will only be used in the context of this domain. Otherwise, another, or the default template, will be chosen.
my-account-customize-email-template.TEXT_DOMAIN_NOTE_CANNOT_BE_SPECIFIC: This template may be shown in the context of multiple domains at once (for example, multiple comments in the same email notification), or may not be in the context of a domain at all. For this reason, this template cannot be domain-specific.
my-account-customize-email-template.TEXT_LOCALIZATIONS_INFO: Translations are customized on a per-locale basis, as users may comment and speak in different languages. Select the locale you want to customize the translations for.
my-account-customize-email-template.TEXT_CUSTOMIZE_FROM_NAME_EMAIL: Looking to customize the From Name and From Email? Do that here.
my-account-customize-email-template.TEXT_TEST_DATA_INFO: Here you can define custom test data used in preview. It is saved along with the template.

my-account-customize-email-template-dele.TEXT_CONFIRM_DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete the template <%= template.displayName %>, created on <%= template.createdAt.toLocaleString() %>?

my-account-customize-email-templates.TEXT_CUSTOM_TEMPLATES_INFO: Here you can define custom email templates for each type of email we send to your users.
my-account-customize-email-templates.TEXT_SEPARATE_TEMPLATES_INFO: You can define separate templates for each site, if desired.
my-account-customize-email-templates.TEXT_MULTIPLE_ALL_DOMAINS_WARNING: Warning! You have multiple templates set to render for All Domains. Only the first one will be used.
my-account-customize-email-templates.TEXT_RENDER_ERRORS_NOTE: This means the template failed to send recently due to errors in the syntax.
my-account-customize-email-templates.TEXT_NO_CUSTOM_TEMPLATES: No custom templates for this email.

my-account-customize-widget.TEXT_NO_CUSTOMIZATIONS: You don't have any customizations for your widgets!

my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_CUSTOMIZE_INTRO_1: You've come to the right place if you want to make FastComments look like your own.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_CUSTOMIZE_INTRO_2: These settings will affect how FastComments looks on your site. You can define these customizations as "rules" - a rule can apply to a whole domain or a single page.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.HEADING_WHAT_SITE_TO_CUSTOMIZE: What site do you want to customize?
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_DOMAIN_NOTE: This is optional. Select All Domains and the rules will apply to all sites. Don't see your site listed? Add it here.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_URL_ID_NOTE_1: This is optional. Leave it blank or enter * and the rules will apply to all pages.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_URL_ID_NOTE_2: Patterns are also supported! For example you could have */blog/* in one configuration and */store/* in another.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.OPTION_AUTOMATIC: Automatic (detect light or dark site background)
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_AUTOMATIC_NOTE: Automatic styling will detect your site's color scheme and attempt to match it. If the site is dark, we'll enable dark mode, for example.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_FORCE_DARK_NOTE: Force Dark Mode will mean your site must have a dark background, otherwise text may be unreadable.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_FORCE_WRAPPED_NOTE: Force Wrapped will put the comment widget in a container with a white background to isolate it from your site.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_NEVER_WRAP_NOTE: Never Wrap is like Auto but only Dark Mode. We'll never put the widget in a container with its own background.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_COMMENT_COUNT_FORMAT_NOTE: Use [count] to represent the localized comment count.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_HIDE_AVATARS_NOTE: Even if someone has an avatar, it won't show next to their name.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_GIF_RATING_NOTE: When image uploads are allowed, this controls the rating of gifs shown in the Gif Picker.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_IMAGE_PROFANITY_NOTE: Controls the level of profanity moderation for uploaded images.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_PROFANITY_LOW: Low: Blocks explicit sexual and violence content
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_PROFANITY_MEDIUM: Medium: Also blocks hate, harassment and self-harm content
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_DISABLE_BLOCKING_NOTE: Do not allow users to block other users. Does not affect existing blocked users.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.LABEL_INPUT_AFTER_COMMENTS: Move reply box to the bottom of the page?
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_INPUT_AFTER_COMMENTS_NOTE: Want people to read the comments before replying?
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_CLICK_TO_SHOW_COMMENTS_NOTE: Hide the comment list and the comment box under a link?
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_USE_SHOW_COMMENTS_TOGGLE_NOTE: Click to show comments, with the ability to show a number of comments by default. Shows the comment box by default.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_COUNT_ABOVE_TOGGLE_NOTE: How many comments should we show above the "Show Comments" button?
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_PREVENT_NEW_REPLIES_NOTE: Enabling this will disable commenting, but show previous comments, for the defined site/url.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_PREVENT_NEW_ROOT_COMMENTS_NOTE: Enabling this will disable creating new top-level comments, but allow replying to existing comments.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_COLLAPSE_LIVE_COMMENTS_NOTE: Enabling this will collapse "live" comments under a "Show X New Comments" button. Otherwise, new live comments will show normally as they are added.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_DISABLE_LIVE_COMMENTING_NOTE: Enabling this will turn off all live features. Clients will not show live updates to the comment feed, votes, comment changes (edits, deletes), and result of moderation actions.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.LABEL_REQUIRE_SSO: Require SSO To View Comments
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_REQUIRE_SSO_NOTE: Enabling this will require commenters to be logged in via SSO (single-sign-on) to view the comment widget. Does not apply to the site admin.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_SSO_SECURITY_LEVEL_NOTE: Choose Simple SSO for third party integrations, Secure SSO for custom server-based integrations.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.LABEL_LIMIT_COMMENTS_BY_GROUPS: Limit Comments by SSO User Groups
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_LIMIT_COMMENTS_BY_GROUPS_NOTE: With this enabled, users will only see comments from their same access groups.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_ENABLE_COMMENTER_LINKS_NOTE: Enabling this will show a field for entering a website or blog URL when commenting. The commenter's username then links to this URL.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_SINGLE_LINE_COMMENT_INPUT_NOTE: Enabling this will change the multi-line comment input field into a single-row input.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.LABEL_COLLAPSE_REPLIES: Collapse Replies to Top-Level Comments by Default
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_COLLAPSE_REPLIES_NOTE: Enabling this will require users to click "Show Replies" to see child comments.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_ENABLE_WYSIWYG_NOTE: Enables WYSIWYG editing which allows formatting text without using visible anchor tags.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_ENABLE_RESIZE_HANDLE_NOTE: Allows users to resize comment input areas by dragging the corner.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_ENABLE_SPOILERS_NOTE: Adds a "SPOILER" button to the editor toolbar.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_DISABLE_TOOLBAR_NOTE: The comment reply toolbar, commonly called a WYSIWYG toolbar, will not show. Users will not be able to make text bold, for example, or upload images.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_DISABLE_VOTING_NOTE: Users will not be able to vote, and existing vote counts will be hidden.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_VOTE_STYLE_NOTE: When the heart icon is enabled, down voting is not possible and also validated server-side.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_ENABLE_VOTE_LIST_NOTE: Show users' names when hovering over comment vote counts.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_DISABLE_COMMENTER_COMMENT_DELETE_NO: Commenters will not be able to delete their comments.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_DISABLE_COMMENTER_COMMENT_EDIT_NOTE: Commenters will not be able to edit their comments.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_DISABLE_AUTO_HASHTAG_CREATION_NOTE: New hash tags will not be automatically bolded. A list of hash tags will have to be provided instead, to enable hash tags. The list of tags can also be maintained via the API.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_DISABLE_NOTIFICATION_BELL_NOTE: The notification bell tells users when someone has replied to them, or replied in a thread they are active in, and more. It can also be used to subscribe to a page.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_DISABLE_PROFILES_NOTE: Disables opening the user's profile when you click on their avatar.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_SHOW_BADGES_IN_TOP_BAR_NOTE: Shows user badges next to their username in the comment reply top bar.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_DEFAULT_SORT_DIRECTION_NOTE: This will set the default sort direction of the comments. Users can still change it after the comments load.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_LOCALE_OVERRIDE_NOTE: This will set the locale for the comment widget, no matter what the user's browser is set to.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_PAGE_SIZE_NOTE: This will set the number of comments per-page. Upon changing, it may take several minutes to update all comment threads.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.OPTION_NAME_FORMAT_CAPITALIZE: Capitalize (display example user as Example User)
my-account-customize-widget-edit.OPTION_NAME_FORMAT_LAST_INITIAL: Last Initial (display Example User as Example U.)
my-account-customize-widget-edit.OPTION_NAME_FORMAT_ALL_INITIALS: All Initials (display Example User as E. U.)
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_COMMENTER_NAME_FORMAT_NOTE: Names are masked server-side to protect users.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_COMMENT_THREAD_DELETION_MODE_NOTE: What should the behavior be when deleting a comment that has replies?
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_ENABLE_THIRD_PARTY_COOKIE_BYPASS_NO: This will cause a popup to be opened to fetch their fastcomments.com cookie when they comment, as a workaround for strict browser settings that block third-party cookies.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_ENABLE_VIEW_COUNTS_NOTE: Enables a live updating count next to each comment that increments when a user views a comment. Comment view counts are only tracked once this is enabled.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_DISABLE_AUTO_ADMIN_MIGRATION_NOTE: Disables automatic admin sync for SSO. Useful for WordPress sites where SSO is enabled and you don't want your WP admins to become FastComment admins or moderators.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_DISABLE_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_NOTE: Disables message that shows after submitting a comment.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_SHOW_QUESTION_NOTE: Read more about collecting feedback here
my-account-customize-widget-edit.OPTION_WHEN_SAVE_ON_ANSWER: On Answer (don't wait for full review)
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_WIDGET_QUESTION_RESULTS_STYLE_NOTE: How to show each user's ratings, if at all.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_WIDGET_QUESTION_NOTE: Create a question to show via Customize -> Questions. Sub-questions will be shown as well if they are configured as part of the selected question.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_RESTRICT_EXTERNAL_LINKS_NOTE: Restrict users to only linking to these sites.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_ALLOWED_SITES_NOTE: Enter comma separated list of domains, or sites, that users can link to.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_ALLOWED_LANGUAGES_NOTE: Comments will only be allowed to be posted in these languages.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_MAX_COMMENT_SIZE_NOTE: This will limit how long of a comment can be written, excluding image URLs.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_MAX_COMMENTS_PER_MINUTE_NOTE: How many comments can non-admin users create per minute?
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_DEFAULT_AVATAR_NOTE: The image that shows when a user doesn't have an avatar defined.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_ALLOW_ANONYMOUS_COMMENTS_NOTE: Anonymous comments will always show as unverified.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_PREVENT_REMOVAL_NOTE: To prevent them from being removed configure your Moderation Settings here.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_HIDE_EMAIL_INPUTS_NOTE: Users will never have to enter their email to comment or vote.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_DEFAULT_USERNAME_NOTE: The default value of the username input field.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_ALLOW_ANONYMOUS_VOTES_NOTE: Votes will be able to be left without being logged in, or providing a username and email.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_ALLOW_ANONYMOUS_FLAGGING_NOTE: Users will be able to flag comments without being logged in.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_HIDE_UNVERIFIED_COMMENT_LABEL_NOTE: Read more about comment verification here
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_USE_ABSOLUTE_DATES_NOTE: This will show dates like "<%= new Date().toLocaleString() %>" instead of "just now".
my-account-customize-widget-edit.LABEL_USE_BOTH_RELATIVE_AND_ABSOLUTE: Use both relative and absolute dates?
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_USE_BOTH_RELATIVE_AND_ABSOLUTE_NOTE: This will show dates like "just now (<%= new Date().toLocaleDateString() %>)" instead of "just now".
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_COMMENT_HTML_RENDERING_MODE_NOTE: Comments are rendered into HTML, and a small safe subset of HTML is supported. We do things like strip too many newlines, large headings, and scripts. You may also choose to render links in raw text instead of an HTML link element to deter spammers.
my-account-customize-widget-edit.TEXT_SPAM_RULES_NOTE: Define custom rules to automatically flag content as spam or not spam based on text matching.

my-account-delete.TEXT_PRIVACY_POLICY_NOTE: If you are deleting your account due to privacy concerns, consider checking our Privacy Policy. We do not sell or share your data with third parties.
my-account-delete.TEXT_ACCOUNT_OWNER_WARNING: You are an account owner. Deleting your account deletes this tenant.
my-account-delete.TEXT_SUBSCRIPTION_CANCELLED: Your subscription will also be cancelled.
my-account-delete.TEXT_NO_SELL_DATA: Note that FastComments does not sell or share your personal information with third parties. We offer free account creation simply as a convenience.
my-account-delete.LABEL_CONFIRM_REMOVAL: Check this box to confirm your account removal. Deleting your account or associated comments can't be undone.
my-account-delete.LABEL_FEEDBACK: Help us understand why we're seeing you go.

my-account-delete-failure.TITLE: Removal Failed
my-account-delete-failure.HEADING: ACCOUNT REMOVAL FAILURE
my-account-delete-failure.DEFAULT_ERROR_MESSAGE: We're not sure what happened, but we'll take a look. Your account may or may not have been completely removed.

my-account-delete-success.TITLE: Removal Succeeded
my-account-delete-success.HEADING: Goodbye!
my-account-delete-success.DESCRIPTION: The username you used is now available, meaning someone else can take it. However your comments have been removed.

my-account-digest-email-comment-approved.TITLE: Comment Approved - FastComments
my-account-digest-email-comment-approved.HEADING: Success!
my-account-digest-email-comment-approved.COMMENT_APPROVED: That comment has been marked reviewed and approved.
my-account-digest-email-comment-approved.VIEW_COMMENT_ON_SITE: You can view the approved comment on your site here, or using the comment thread viewer here.
my-account-digest-email-comment-approved.CLOSE_PAGE: You can now close this page.

my-account-digest-email-comment-marked-a.TITLE: Comment Marked As Spam - FastComments
my-account-digest-email-comment-marked-a.HEADING: Success!
my-account-digest-email-comment-marked-a.COMMENT_MARKED_SPAM: That comment has been marked as spam.
my-account-digest-email-comment-marked-a.COMMENT_HIDDEN: The comment has automatically been hidden from your site.
my-account-digest-email-comment-marked-a.CLOSE_PAGE: You can now close this page.

my-account-digest-email-error.TITLE: Error - FastComments
my-account-digest-email-error.DESCRIPTION: If you copied the link from your email, make sure you copied it correctly.
my-account-digest-email-error.CLOSE_PAGE: You can now close this page.

my-account-digest-email-expired.TITLE: Link Expired - FastComments
my-account-digest-email-expired.DESCRIPTION: This link has expired - they only last 30 days. Did you try to approve a comment in an old email?
my-account-digest-email-expired.CLOSE_PAGE: You can now close this page.

my-account-digest-email-unsubscribed-suc.TITLE: Unsubscribed - FastComments
my-account-digest-email-unsubscribed-suc.HEADING: Unsubscribed
my-account-digest-email-unsubscribed-suc.DESCRIPTION: You won't get the FastComments Digest any more. If you'd like to change the frequency of the email (to get it daily, weekly, or monthly) then check here.
my-account-digest-email-unsubscribed-suc.CLOSE_PAGE: You can now close this page.

my-account-edit-details.TITLE: Edit Account Details - FastComments
my-account-edit-details.HEADING: Account Details
my-account-edit-details.EMAIL_VERIFIED_SUCCESS: Success! Your email has been verified.
my-account-edit-details.VERIFICATION_EMAIL_SENT: Sent email verification email. Check your email inbox at <%- user.pendingEmail %> for a link to complete the process.
my-account-edit-details.DISPLAY_NAME_HELP: This is used on your comments instead of your username.
my-account-edit-details.EMAIL_PENDING_VERIFICATION: This email is pending verification. The email <%- user.email %> is still used.
my-account-edit-details.WEBSITE_URL_HELP: Your username will link to this in comment threads. Note that not all communities have this feature enabled.
my-account-edit-details.BIO_HELP: This will appear on your public profile. Maximum 500 characters.
my-account-edit-details.COUNTRY_HELP: This will display a flag emoji on your profile.

my-account-edit-details-change-password.TITLE: Change Password - FastComments
my-account-edit-details-change-password.HEADING: Change Password
my-account-edit-details-change-password.REQUEST_LINK_QUESTION: Would you like to request a link by email to set a new password?
my-account-edit-details-change-password.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Success! We sent you a link to change your password.
my-account-edit-details-change-password.FAILURE_MESSAGE: Something went wrong. Please try again later. If this persists please reach out to support.

my-account-edit-details-change-password-.TITLE: Change Password - FastComments
my-account-edit-details-change-password-.HEADING: Change Password
my-account-edit-details-change-password-.PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: Min password length is six characters.
my-account-edit-details-change-password-.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Success! Your password has been changed.
my-account-edit-details-change-password-.INVALID_LINK_MESSAGE: Oh no! It looks like this password reset link is invalid. Note that they can only be used once.
my-account-edit-details-change-password-.FAILURE_MESSAGE: Something went wrong. Please try again later. If this persists please reach out to support.

my-account-edit-notifications.TITLE: Configure Notifications - FastComments
my-account-edit-notifications.HEADING: Notifications Settings
my-account-edit-notifications.REPLY_NOTIFICATIONS_HELP_TENANT: Hourly Notifications includes notifications about new comments, as well as replies to your own. We'll also send notifications when you're tagged.
my-account-edit-notifications.REPLY_NOTIFICATIONS_HELP_USER: Notifications when you're tagged or replied to.
my-account-edit-notifications.ENABLE_NOTIFICATIONS_HELP: This includes admin-only notifications, like hourly notifications about new comments, and notices regarding your account.
my-account-edit-notifications.DIGEST_DESCRIPTION: We can send you a reminder for comments you may have to review or approve on a regular schedule, as well as counts for:
my-account-edit-notifications.DIGEST_SCHEDULE_HELP: We'll send you a summary email on this schedule.
my-account-edit-notifications.LANGUAGE_HELP: The language that emails should be translated in.
my-account-edit-notifications.SUBSCRIPTIONS_DESCRIPTION: Here you can manage your page subscriptions. To be notified of new comments on a page, click the bell on a comment widget and click "Subscribe".
my-account-edit-notifications.NO_SUBSCRIPTIONS: You don't have any subscriptions yet.

my-account-get-code.TITLE: My Account Code
my-account-get-code.HEADING: Comment Widget Code
my-account-get-code.COPY_CODE_DESCRIPTION: Copy the following code into a webpage to create an instance of FastComments.
my-account-get-code.EXTENSION_LINK: Comments not showing? Try our Chrome Extension.
my-account-get-code.ADVANCED_OPTIONS_NOTE: Please note that some of these advanced options can be configured easily via the "Customize" link in the top right, meaning no coding is required.
my-account-get-code.CODE_TABBED_DEMO_TEXT: Script is for demo purposes only. To get a snippet for production, create an account.

my-account-help.TITLE: Help - FastComments
my-account-help.HEADING: Customer Service
my-account-help.NOTE_SYSTEM_ADMIN: Note! You are reaching out to FastComments.com, the provider of real time discussion software.
my-account-help.TARGET_TYPE_LABEL: Who should this help request go to?
my-account-help.QUESTION_PLACEHOLDER: Enter your question or request here.
my-account-help.FILE_HELP: (Optional - you can attach a file if you have additional context/information to provide.)
my-account-help.FILE_WARNING: Do not upload anything sensitive, like personally identifiable information. Consider this file public.
my-account-help.SUBMISSION_NOTE: We'll reach back out to you via email. This form will email us repeatedly until we acknowledge it - you'll hear back!
my-account-help.ALERT_BOOTCAMP:
FastComments.com does not run bootcamps. We simply build awesome discussion software :)

 You should check out the support page of the site you are commenting on.

my-account-help-acknowledge-failure.TITLE: Help Request Failure - FastComments
my-account-help-acknowledge-failure.HEADING: Help Request Not Acknowledged!
my-account-help-acknowledge-failure.DEFAULT_ERROR_MESSAGE: We couldn't process your request, sorry about that. We're looking into it. You can try clicking the acknowledge link again.

my-account-help-acknowledge-success.TITLE: Help Request Acknowledged - FastComments
my-account-help-acknowledge-success.HEADING: Help Request Acknowledged
my-account-help-acknowledge-success.USER_NOTIFIED_DESCRIPTION: The user has been notified that you acknowledged this request, and you won't receive any more notifications to acknowledge it. You should now email the user to answer their help request.
my-account-help-acknowledge-success.USER_NOT_FOUND: The user was not found to be notified, but you won't receive any more notifications for this request.

my-account-help-failure.TITLE: Help Request Failure - FastComments
my-account-help-failure.HEADING: REQUEST FAILURE
my-account-help-failure.ERROR_MESSAGE: We couldn't process your request, sorry about that. We're looking into it. You can try resubmitting the form again later.

my-account-help-ignore-failure.TITLE: Help Request Failure - FastComments
my-account-help-ignore-failure.HEADING: Help Request Not Ignored!
my-account-help-ignore-failure.DEFAULT_ERROR_MESSAGE: We couldn't process your request, sorry about that. We're looking into it. You can try clicking the ignore link again.

my-account-help-ignore-success.TITLE: Help Request Ignored - FastComments
my-account-help-ignore-success.HEADING: Help Request Ignored
my-account-help-ignore-success.DESCRIPTION: You won't receive any more notifications to acknowledge this request.

my-account-help-need-to-login.TITLE: Help - FastComments
my-account-help-need-to-login.HEADING: Don't Worry, We're a Login Away
my-account-help-need-to-login.REQUIRES_LOGIN: This page requires you to have an account and be logged in.
my-account-help-need-to-login.ACCOUNT_TYPES: There are different kinds of accounts. Select the login or registration link that best suites you.
my-account-help-need-to-login.SITE_OWNER: I'm a site owner that wants to use FastComments and I have a question
my-account-help-need-to-login.COMMENTER: I just write comments - I don't want to run FastComments on a site, but I have a question.

my-account-installation-wizard.TITLE: Install FastComments
my-account-installation-wizard.COMMENTER_ACCOUNT_WARNING: This account is for leaving comments only! Before adding FastComments to a website please select a package to start your free trial.

my-account-licenses.TITLE: Licenses - FastComments
my-account-licenses.HEADING: My Licenses
my-account-licenses.NO_LICENSES: You have no licenses! Licenses are used for running FastComments On-Prem.
my-account-licenses.CONTACT_SALES: Contact Sales to get an On-Prem license.
my-account-licenses.TOKEN_RETRIEVED_TITLE: This token has been retrieved. Reach out to support to create a new one if needed.

my-account-manage-data-audit-logs.TITLE: Audit Logs - FastComments
my-account-manage-data-audit-logs.HEADING: Audit Logs
my-account-manage-data-audit-logs.AUDITING_DISABLED: Auditing is disabled. If you'd like to purchase a plan that includes auditing, let us know.
my-account-manage-data-audit-logs.PRIVATE_INFO_WARNING: Note! Viewing the details below may reveal private information.
my-account-manage-data-audit-logs.NO_LOGS_FOUND: No logs found for the specified filters.
my-account-manage-data-audit-logs.NO_AUDIT_LOGS: You don't have any audit logs.

my-account-manage-data-copy-comments.TITLE: Copy Comments - FastComments
my-account-manage-data-copy-comments.HEADING: Copy Comments
my-account-manage-data-copy-comments.DESCRIPTION_PART1: This tool allows you to batch copy your comments that are already uploaded to the FastComments platform, from one page to another. If you're looking to copy your comments from your site, you want the import tool.
my-account-manage-data-copy-comments.DESCRIPTION_PART2: This tool works with full URLs, or a URL ID.
my-account-manage-data-copy-comments.URL_ID_FROM_PLACEHOLDER: A URL or an Article/Post ID
my-account-manage-data-copy-comments.URL_ID_TO_PLACEHOLDER: A URL or an Article/Post ID
my-account-manage-data-copy-comments.URL_TO_HELP: Since the URL ID may be an ID and not a URL, enter the destination URL here even if it is the same value.
my-account-manage-data-copy-comments.EMAIL_NOTIFICATION: You'll receive an email with a download link when complete. You can view the status of jobs below.
my-account-manage-data-copy-comments.REFRESH_FOR_STATUS: Refresh the page to get the latest status.
my-account-manage-data-copy-comments.NO_JOBS: You don't have any pending or past jobs.

my-account-manage-data-export.TITLE: Export Comments - FastComments
my-account-manage-data-export.HEADING: Export Comments
my-account-manage-data-export.EMAIL_NOTIFICATION: You'll receive an email with a download link when complete. You can view the status of exports below.
my-account-manage-data-export.REFRESH_FOR_STATUS: Refresh the page to get the latest status.
my-account-manage-data-export.NO_EXPORTS: You don't have any pending or past exports.
my-account-manage-data-export.EXPORT_EXPIRY_NOTE: Note: Exports auto expire after ten days. The data is deleted and the download link will be removed after this time.

my-account-manage-data-import.TITLE: Import Comments - FastComments
my-account-manage-data-import.HEADING: Import Comments
my-account-manage-data-import.INPUT_FILE_LABEL: Input File (Drag and Drop or Click to Upload)
my-account-manage-data-import.EMAIL_NOTIFICATION: You'll receive an email notifying you when it's complete.
my-account-manage-data-import.REFRESH_FOR_STATUS: Refresh the page to get the latest status.
my-account-manage-data-import.NO_IMPORTS: You don't have any pending or past imports.

my-account-manage-data-import-logs.TITLE: Import Logs - FastComments
my-account-manage-data-import-logs.HEADING: Logs For Job <%= job._id %>
my-account-manage-data-import-logs.NO_LOGS: There are no logs for this job.
my-account-manage-data-import-logs.REASON_NOT_STARTED: The job might not have started yet.
my-account-manage-data-import-logs.REASON_BEFORE_SUPPORT: It may be from before we added log support.
my-account-manage-data-import-logs.REASON_NO_SUPPORT: The job type might not support logs.

my-account-manage-data-import-scheduled-.TITLE: Schedule Comments - FastComments
my-account-manage-data-import-scheduled-.HEADING: Schedule Comments
my-account-manage-data-import-scheduled-.DESCRIPTION_PART1: Here you can schedule comments to be automatically posted, live, over time. This can allow you to annotate pages, like webinars, or even kick off discussion on a page for a live event in an automated way.
my-account-manage-data-import-scheduled-.DESCRIPTION_PART2: This is done by importing comments using the supported CSV Format (example here).
my-account-manage-data-import-scheduled-.DESCRIPTION_SCHEDULING_TYPES: There are two types of scheduling. The first is that the comments start playing on every page load, which is when "Every Page Load" is selected, and the second type is manually scheduling the comments by coming here and clicking "start".
my-account-manage-data-import-scheduled-.AUTO_PLAY_WARNING: Note! Adding Auto-Play comments (by selecting "Every Page Load" below) will cause any new comments posted in an autoplay thread to be added to the autoplay script. The comments can be moderated via the Moderate Comments page.
my-account-manage-data-import-scheduled-.REPLAY_NAME_HELP: You can name your imports to easily find them later.
my-account-manage-data-import-scheduled-.MANUAL_SAME_TIME: Manually, Same Time for All Users
my-account-manage-data-import-scheduled-.INPUT_FILE_LABEL: Input File (Drag and Drop or Click to Upload)
my-account-manage-data-import-scheduled-.MANUAL_CONFIRMATION_NOTE: If you selected Manual above, we'll wait for your confirmation to start playing back comments. You'll receive an email notifying you when it's ready to play. Otherwise, comments will auto play every time a user loads the page.
my-account-manage-data-import-scheduled-.REFRESH_FOR_STATUS: Refresh the page to get the latest status.
my-account-manage-data-import-scheduled-.NO_IMPORTS: You don't have any pending or past scheduled comment imports.

my-account-manage-data-integrations.HEADING: Integrations
my-account-manage-data-integrations.NO_INTEGRATIONS_MESSAGE: You have no integrations! Integrations are used to keep third party services, like WordPress, in sync with your FastComments account.
my-account-manage-data-integrations.WORDPRESS_PLUGIN_LINK_TEXT: Learn about the WordPress plugin installation here.

my-account-manage-data-integrations-inte.HEADING: Delete Integration Token
my-account-manage-data-integrations-inte.CONFIRM_DELETE_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete this <%= integration.readableType %> integration token<%= integration.domain ? ' for ' + integration.domain : '' %>?

my-account-manage-data-integrations-inte.HEADING: Integration Logs.
my-account-manage-data-integrations-inte.NOSCRIPT_MESSAGE: Please enable JavaScript to see the logs.
my-account-manage-data-integrations-inte.PAGE_UPDATE_INFO: This page will update as the integration progresses.
my-account-manage-data-integrations-inte.SYNC_INFO: After this is done we'll keep your comments in sync with your site so if you ever deactivate FastComments you won't lose any data.
my-account-manage-data-integrations-inte.LOGS_RETENTION_INFO: These logs will be kept for two years.

my-account-manage-data-integrations-inte.HEADING: Integration Token Settings
my-account-manage-data-integrations-inte.SUB_HEADING: Editing a <%= integration.readableType %> integration token<%= integration.domain ? ' for ' + integration.domain : '' %>.
my-account-manage-data-integrations-inte.ENABLE_EVENT_FETCH_LABEL: Clients using this integration should be able to periodically fetch new comments.
my-account-manage-data-integrations-inte.ENABLE_EVENT_FETCH_DESCRIPTION: This will allow clients using this integration token to fetch the event log so they can stay in sync. Useful if you have WordPress plugins that require comment data in your own database.

my-account-manage-data-migrate-domains.HEADING: Migrate Comments
my-account-manage-data-migrate-domains.INTRO_DESCRIPTION: This tool allows you to batch migrate your comments across different URLs or sites.
my-account-manage-data-migrate-domains.URL_INFO: You can enter part of a URL, like a domain, or a full URL, or a URL ID.
my-account-manage-data-migrate-domains.DOMAIN_FROM_LABEL: What URL or domain are you migrating from?
my-account-manage-data-migrate-domains.DOMAIN_TO_LABEL: What URL or domain are you migrating to?
my-account-manage-data-migrate-domains.EMAIL_NOTIFICATION_INFO: You'll receive an email notifying you when it's complete.
my-account-manage-data-migrate-domains.NOSCRIPT_REFRESH_MESSAGE: Refresh the page to get the latest status.
my-account-manage-data-migrate-domains.NO_MIGRATIONS_MESSAGE: You don't have any pending or past domain migrations.

my-account-manage-data-users-export.HEADING: Export Users
my-account-manage-data-users-export.EMAIL_NOTIFICATION_INFO: You'll receive an email with a download link when complete. You can view the status of exports below.
my-account-manage-data-users-export.NOSCRIPT_REFRESH_MESSAGE: Refresh the page to get the latest status.
my-account-manage-data-users-export.EXPIRATION_NOTE: Note: Exports auto expire after ten days. The data is deleted and the download link will be removed after this time.
my-account-manage-data-users-export.NO_EXPORTS_MESSAGE: You don't have any pending or past exports.

my-account-manage-data-webhooks.HEADING: Webhooks
my-account-manage-data-webhooks.PRODUCTION_NOTE_1: Ensure that you verify the "token" parameter in the request. This will be populated with your API secret, available here.
my-account-manage-data-webhooks.PRODUCTION_NOTE_2: When an invalid token is provided, return 401 Unauthorized.
my-account-manage-data-webhooks.PRODUCTION_NOTE_3: When a valid token is provided, return 200 OK.
my-account-manage-data-webhooks.PRODUCTION_NOTE_4: Not doing so will cause the integration to fail validation.
my-account-manage-data-webhooks.PRODUCTION_NOTE_5: Note that events are not immediate. There may be up to a minute delay as our system is asynchronous.
my-account-manage-data-webhooks.PRODUCTION_NOTE_6: If you do not return a 200 OK status code we will try again after minute. The delay increases by a minute after each failure for that event.
my-account-manage-data-webhooks.DOCUMENTATION_LINK_TEXT: For more documentation and the request structure, see here.
my-account-manage-data-webhooks.NOSCRIPT_MESSAGE: JavaScript is required for this UI to function properly.
my-account-manage-data-webhooks.RECENT_FAILURES_MESSAGE: You have recent webhook failures. Try checking the logs.

my-account-manage-data-webhooks-for-doma.IDEMPOTENT_OPERATION_TITLE: This should be an idempotent operation as it contains an ID - so it is a PUT.

my-account-manage-data-webhooks-logs.HEADING: Webhook Logs
my-account-manage-data-webhooks-logs.INTRO_DESCRIPTION: Here you can view the request and response information for each sync attempt. This is useful to debug why sync may be failing. For example, view a failed log to see the response we see from your servers.
my-account-manage-data-webhooks-logs.NO_LOGS_MESSAGE: No logs found for the specified filters.
my-account-manage-data-webhooks-logs.RETENTION_INFO: Webhook logs are retained for one year.
my-account-manage-data-webhooks-logs.N_A_VALUES_NOTE: Some entries may show N/A for values we did not always collect.

my-account-managed-tenants-create.HEADING: Create a Managed Tenant
my-account-managed-tenants-create.INTRO_PARAGRAPH_1: Creating a managed tenant allows you to manage the tenant from your parent account. This is useful for reselling FastComments, or providing isolated accounts to your clients.
my-account-managed-tenants-create.INTRO_PARAGRAPH_2: You don't need to do this to use FastComments. However, if you want to have multiple sites and completely isolate each site with its own moderators and users, it can be useful to have them as their own tenants.
my-account-managed-tenants-create.WEBSITE_ADDRESS_HEADING: What is the address of the website where FastComments will show for this tenant?
my-account-managed-tenants-create.WEBSITE_ADDRESS_DESCRIPTION: No need to input subdomains or localhost. For multiple sites, separate them with commas.
my-account-managed-tenants-create.LIMITS_AND_PRICING_DESCRIPTION: With FastComments, you can customize the available packages to the tenant on a per-tenant basis. The below is populated by default with the limits and pricing of this parent tenant. Currently, you must bill your customer outside of FastComments. We will bill you based on their usage if you are on a Flex plan, or a flat rate on the Pro plan. You can find the pricing for this here.
my-account-managed-tenants-create.USAGE_LIMITS_DESCRIPTION: Limits are limited to the values of the current tenant. You may raise these by working with support. You may want to lower these values to limit what the managed tenant can do.

my-account-managed-tenants-create-succes.HEADING: Tenant Created
my-account-managed-tenants-create-succes.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your tenant has been created successfully!
my-account-managed-tenants-create-succes.NEXT_STEPS_INTRO: You might want to take some common steps to continue setup:
my-account-managed-tenants-create-succes.NEXT_STEP_3: Grab the Tenant ID (available on the API/SSO info page) for integrations.
my-account-managed-tenants-create-succes.TENANTS_VIEW_LINK_TEXT: This can be done by going back to the tenants view and switching to the tenant.
my-account-managed-tenants-create-succes.TENANT_SWITCHING_INFO: All actions to managed tenants are done via tenant switching, including deleting the tenant if needed.

my-account-moderate-comments.NEW_UI_ALERT_MESSAGE: Try the new Moderation dashboard and give your feedback! The switchover is on October 15th.
my-account-moderate-comments.HEADING: Comment Moderation
my-account-moderate-comments.FILTERING_BY_IP_TITLE: Note! FastComments does not store raw IP addresses. We use something called 'hashing' to join comments by IP.
my-account-moderate-comments.NO_IP_ERROR: There is no IP address associated with the requested comment.

my-account-moderate-comments-banned-user.HEADING: Banned Users
my-account-moderate-comments-banned-user.INTRO_PARAGRAPH_1: Below is a list of your users, or emails, that have been banned from commenting or voting on your domains. If a user is "shadow banned" their comments and votes will still appear to post for them, but they won't be saved.
my-account-moderate-comments-banned-user.INTRO_PARAGRAPH_2: You can ban users via the "ban" option on the Moderate Comments page, or by clicking the plus icon at the bottom of this page if you have a specific email to ban.
my-account-moderate-comments-banned-user.INTRO_PARAGRAPH_3: When banned users try to comment it will show up in the audit log with the description "Banned user blocked from commenting."
my-account-moderate-comments-banned-user.IP_BAN_WARNING: FastComments does not store raw IP addresses for IP based banning. Be careful when using IP based bans as IP addresses can be reassigned.
my-account-moderate-comments-banned-user.SHOWING_BANNED_USERS: Showing <%= Number((page - 1) * count).toLocaleString() %> - <%= Number(((page - 1) * count) + bannedUsers.length).toLocaleString() %> of <%= totalCount %> Banned Users
my-account-moderate-comments-banned-user.NO_BANNED_USERS_MESSAGE: You don't have any banned users! Congrats on having a great community.

my-account-moderate-comments-banned-user.HEADING: Ban a User
my-account-moderate-comments-banned-user.INTRO_DESCRIPTION: Here you can enter an email to ban a user by. There are a couple ways to ban a user. Permanently banning a user will never allow them to vote or comment, and they will know right away when they try to comment as it will tell them. Shadow banning will make it appear as their votes or comments are successful, but they won't persist.

my-account-moderate-comments-banned-user.HEADING: Un-Ban a User
my-account-moderate-comments-banned-user.CONFIRM_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to un-ban this user?
my-account-moderate-comments-banned-user.BANNED_FOR_SAYING_TEXT: They were banned for saying "<%= bannedUser.bannedCommentText %>"

my-account-moderate-comments-blacklist.HEADING: Comment Word Blacklist
my-account-moderate-comments-blacklist.INTRO_PARAGRAPH_1: Below are lists of comma-separated words and phrases that will be masked in comments and usernames. Be careful what words you pick here - blacklisting too common of words will drive away your community.
my-account-moderate-comments-blacklist.INTRO_PARAGRAPH_2: These are defined per-locale. A locale is a combination of a language and a geographical region.
my-account-moderate-comments-blacklist.INTRO_PARAGRAPH_3: You will see that we differentiate between words and phrases. Entries in the word list should not contain spaces or special characters. If you have a phrase that contains spaces, or periods, etc, add that to the phrase list instead.
my-account-moderate-comments-blacklist.NOSCRIPT_MESSAGE: JavaScript is required for this configuration UI to function properly.
my-account-moderate-comments-blacklist.MASKED_WORDS_DESCRIPTION: Words in this list (comma separated) will be masked like ***.
my-account-moderate-comments-blacklist.MASKED_WORDS_PLACEHOLDER: Enter a comma separated list of bad words, like 'some, bad, words'.
my-account-moderate-comments-blacklist.WORDS_LENGTH_ERROR: You may enter up to 5,000 words per locale. You've entered .
my-account-moderate-comments-blacklist.MASKED_PHRASES_DESCRIPTION: Phrases in this list (comma separated) will be masked like ********.
my-account-moderate-comments-blacklist.MASKED_PHRASES_PLACEHOLDER: Enter a comma separated list of bad phrases, like 'some bad phrase, some other bad phrase'.
my-account-moderate-comments-blacklist.PHRASES_LENGTH_ERROR: You may enter up to 5,000 phrases per locale. You've entered .

my-account-moderate-comments-comments-li.SHOWING_COMMENTS: Showing <%= Number((page - 1) * count).toLocaleString() %> - <%= Number(((page - 1) * count) + comments.length).toLocaleString() %>
my-account-moderate-comments-comments-li.CONFIRM_REMOVAL_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
my-account-moderate-comments-comments-li.RESET_FLAG_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to reset the flag count on this comment?
my-account-moderate-comments-comments-li.RESET_FLAG_NOTE: This will not affect users who have flagged this comment.
my-account-moderate-comments-comments-li.BAN_USER_MESSAGE: How would you like to ban this user?
my-account-moderate-comments-comments-li.ANONYMOUS_COMMENT_NOTE: This is an anonymous comment. No email or account is available to ban.
my-account-moderate-comments-comments-li.DELETE_ALL_COMMENTS_LABEL: Delete All of <%= comment.commenterName ? comment.commenterName : 'Anonymous' %>'s comments.
my-account-moderate-comments-comments-li.BAN_DELETES_COMMENT_NOTE: Banning this user will also delete this comment.
my-account-moderate-comments-comments-li.NO_COMMENTS_MESSAGE: Looks like you don't have any comments yet.
my-account-moderate-comments-comments-li.NEEDS_REVIEW_NOTE: Note: New comments by admins or moderators will not show up under "Needs Review".

my-account-moderate-comments-moderation-.HEADING: Delete Moderation Group?
my-account-moderate-comments-moderation-.CONFIRM_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete the group <%= moderationGroup.name %>?

my-account-moderate-comments-moderation-.INTRO_NEW: You've come to the right place if you want to create a moderation group.

my-account-moderate-comments-moderation-.HEADING: Moderation Groups
my-account-moderate-comments-moderation-.INTRO_DESCRIPTION: Comments and moderators can be assigned to Moderation Groups. When a moderator is assigned to one or more groups, they will only see comments from those moderation groups in the Moderate Comments page. If you only have a small set of moderators that moderate everything you should not assign them to moderation groups.
my-account-moderate-comments-moderation-.NO_GROUPS_MESSAGE: You don't have any moderation groups!

my-account-moderate-comments-moderator-d.HEADING: Removing a Moderator
my-account-moderate-comments-moderator-d.CANNOT_UNDO: This can't be undone. <%= moderator.name %> won't be able to see or moderate your comments anymore.
my-account-moderate-comments-moderator-d.NOTIFICATION_INFO: They will be notified of being removed as a moderator via an automated email.
my-account-moderate-comments-moderator-d.METRICS_WARNING: All of their metrics will be removed (if you want to change their email, you can edit it from the previous page).

my-account-moderate-comments-moderator-e.INTRO_PARAGRAPH_1: You've come to the right place if you want to give someone access to moderate your comments.
my-account-moderate-comments-moderator-e.INTRO_PARAGRAPH_2: Note that you don't need to add moderators for admin users. Admin users already have moderation capabilities.
my-account-moderate-comments-moderator-e.GROUPS_SECTION_HEADING: What groups do they belong to?
my-account-moderate-comments-moderator-e.GROUPS_DESCRIPTION: They'll only see comments from these groups in the Moderate Comments page.

my-account-moderate-comments-moderator-s.HEADING: Site Selection
my-account-moderate-comments-moderator-s.SUB_HEADING: What account do you want to moderate comments for?
my-account-moderate-comments-moderator-s.MULTIPLE_ACCOUNTS_INFO: Administrators have added you to multiple accounts.
my-account-moderate-comments-moderator-s.LATER_INFO: Later, you will have the option to come back here via a link in the top right.

my-account-moderate-comments-moderators.HEADING: Comment Moderators
my-account-moderate-comments-moderators.ERROR_RATE_LIMITED: You've been rate limited for sending moderator invites. Please wait and try again, or reach out to support.

my-account-moderate-comments-settings.HEADING: Comment Moderation Settings
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.ENABLE_PROFANITY_DETECTION_DESCRIPTION: Comments are checked for profanity in real-time. Does not affect comments by administrators or moderators.
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.AUTO_SEND_PROFANE_TO_SPAM_LABEL: Automatically Send Profane Comments to Spam
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.AUTO_SEND_PROFANE_TO_SPAM_DESCRIPTION: Instead of being masked, profane comments (determined via the phrase blacklist) will be hidden and marked as spam.
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.ALLOW_PROFANE_NAMES_DESCRIPTION: When enabled, commenter names will not be checked for profanity or masked.
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.ENABLE_SPAM_DETECTION_DESCRIPTION: Spam detection happens in real-time. Comments that look like spam will be hidden. Moderators can review and approve them as needed. Admins and moderator comments are excluded.
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.BLOCK_SPAM_DESCRIPTION: Instead of allowing comments that look like spam, and approving them later, block them and tell the user to change their comment. The comments will not be submitted for moderation. For sites where the spam volume is too high to moderate.
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.SPAM_FILTER_DESCRIPTION_BAYES: With Naïve Bayes, you can use the spam filter everyone else uses, or isolate your spam filter training to just your tenant. Both continuously learn.
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.SPAM_FILTER_DESCRIPTION_LLM_AVAILABLE: Select LLM to use ChatGPT for spam detection (billed $<%= tenantPackage.flexChatGPTCostCents / 100 %> per 1k tokens). Only non-obvious spam is sent to OpenAI to reduce costs.
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.SPAM_FILTER_DESCRIPTION_LLM_UNAVAILABLE: ChatGPT-based spam detection is available for Flex (custom packages available).
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.AUTO_APPROVE_COMMENTS_DESCRIPTION: Changing this setting will not affect past comments.
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.ONLY_AUTO_APPROVE_VERIFIED_DESCRIPTION: Unverified comments won't show for anyone. Changing this setting will not affect past comments.
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.ONLY_AUTO_APPROVE_APPROVED_USERS_LABEL: Only Auto Approve For Approved Users
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.ONLY_AUTO_APPROVE_APPROVED_USERS_DESCRIP: With this, manual approval is required for the user's first comment. If a user has had a comment approved before, then their comment won't require manual approval.
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.AUTO_REMOVE_UNVERIFIED_DESCRIPTION_1: This will happen daily at 12AM PST.
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.AUTO_REMOVE_UNVERIFIED_DESCRIPTION_2: Manually approved, unverified comments, will not expire.
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.UNVERIFIED_TTL_LABEL: How long should we keep unverified comments?
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.UNVERIFIED_TTL_DESCRIPTION: Unverified comments are checked for removal daily at 12AM PST.
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.REPEAT_COMMENT_ACTION_DESCRIPTION: Optionally prevent spammers and abusive users from posting repeat comments.
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.AUTO_UNAPPROVE_FLAGGED_DESCRIPTION: Comments can be hidden if enough users flag them.
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.FLAGGED_THRESHOLD_LABEL: How many times should a comment being flagged result in it being un-approved?
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.FLAGGED_THRESHOLD_DESCRIPTION: Comments will be-unapproved after reaching this threshold. Being un-approved means it will not show.
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.FUTURE_COMMENTS_NOTE: Changing these settings will only affect future comments.
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.SPAM_PROFANITY_BLOG_LINK: Read more about FastComments Spam and Profanity filtering here.
my-account-moderate-comments-settings.COPY_TO_SUB_TENANTS_DESCRIPTION: Checking this will copy the settings to all sub tenants.

my-account-moderate-comments-settings-up.HEADING: UPDATE FAILURE
my-account-moderate-comments-settings-up.ERROR_MESSAGE: We couldn't process your request, your settings were not updated. We're looking into it.

my-account-moderate-comments-settings-up.HEADING: Settings Updated
my-account-moderate-comments-settings-up.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Any further comments submitted will use the new configuration.

my-account-moderate-comments-thread.HEADING: Comment Thread Viewer
my-account-moderate-comments-thread.THREAD_DETAILS: You're viewing the comment thread at <%= thread.urlDecoded %>
my-account-moderate-comments-thread.PAGE_ID_INFO: Viewing Comments for Page ID: <%- thread.urlIdDecoded %>

my-account-question-config-delete.HEADING: Delete "<%= question.name %>"?
my-account-question-config-delete.CONFIRM_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete the question "<%= question.question %>", created on <%= question.createdAt.toLocaleString() %>?
my-account-question-config-delete.DATA_LOSS_WARNING: The data from these replies will no longer be available in reporting.

my-account-question-config-edit.NOTE_UPDATE_LIMITATION: Only certain aspects of a question can be updated once it's created. To change the question type, delete or hide the question and create a new one.
my-account-question-config-edit.INTRO_TEXT: To create a question, first we have to pick the question type, which determines how it will be presented.
my-account-question-config-edit.INTRO_NAME_TEXT: Also pick a name that can be used to refer to the question internally.
my-account-question-config-edit.NOSCRIPT_WARNING: This page requires JavaScript to work properly.
my-account-question-config-edit.HELP_INTERNAL_NAME: Respondents will not see this name. It is for internal and reporting use only.
my-account-question-config-edit.HELP_REPORTING_ORDER: Defines the ordering of questions in reports.

my-account-saml-config.HELP_IDP_ENTITY_ID: The entity ID that identifies your Identity Provider. If left blank, defaults to your FastComments URL.
my-account-saml-config.HELP_IDP_CERTIFICATE: The X.509 certificate from your Identity Provider used to verify SAML responses.

-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----
...private key content...
-----END PRIVATE KEY-----
my-account-saml-config.HELP_DECRYPTION_KEY: Private key for decrypting encrypted SAML assertions (only needed if your IdP encrypts assertions).
my-account-saml-config.HELP_SIGNATURE_ALGORITHM: Algorithm used to verify SAML response signatures.
my-account-saml-config.HELP_DIGEST_ALGORITHM: Algorithm used for digest computation in SAML responses.
my-account-saml-config.HELP_NAME_ID_FORMAT: Format for the Name ID in SAML assertions.

my-account-wp-connect.HEADING_DOMAIN_QUESTION: Is Your WordPress Site One of These?
